name: Space Trials
description:
GET READY for SPACE TOUR !

This is going to be Long Unknown Journey to so many of planets. Endless of fun coming up with lots of planets and the empty space. So many to discover as the journey continues...

Unique set of Avatars to choose from as your disguise along with lots of excitement. Try to go as far you can with endless storyline and nothing gonna stop you.  Oxygen is the thing you need to survive in this huge Universe along with lots of other unique items to fill your pockets with. 

Have fun with this exploring tour with nothing else except a crazy ambience to excite your ears.
